predicate.note: Frames file for 'replenish' based on sentences in wsj and automatic expansion via verbnet.

roleset.name: refill

example.name: only container
example.text: The government moved aggressively to open the spigots of federal aid for victims of the California earthquake, but its reservoir of emergency funds must be replenished *trace* soon if the aid is to continue.
example.arg: if the aid is to continue

example.name: container and substance
example.text: The disaster fund is replenished *trace* by loan repayments.

roleset.note: Be careful with the agent/substance distinction--reserve Arg0 only for actual (human) agents causing some (metaphorical) container to be filled with some (metaphorical) substance.
